message: Hi Bob, I believe this product will be a great fit for you. I can offer it to you for $14500. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product but given my budget constraints, I'd be more comfortable at a price of $12500. Would you be willing to meet me there?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer. I really value this product and believe it's worth closer to its market value. How about we settle at $14000?
